name: Board Of Society [TEAM 7]
description:
Board Of Society is a turn based puzzle and tactical game. Discover in a Low poly isometric board the world you must fight for. You need to take over multiple sensitive sites in your city to avoid the total control of the local government.

In a world where freedom, liberty and free-will are controlled by the authorities, you are the only one who can take the decisions to overthrow the situation. Manage your small teams in a smarter way than the opponent and fight to victory or perish in a world where there is no future.

Will you be able to stop oppression?

- Manage up to 3 squads in a puzzle game to outsmart the government
- Try to unravel the strategy set up by the opponent
- Use wisely your movements to always be one step ahead
- Don’t get overwhelmed by the enemy.
